attributes.action: STOP London Underground Limited attacking small businesses by terminating our licences and not allowing us to operate within and around tube stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
London Underground Limited (LUL) is doing this with 1 months notice. To be closed by 1st December 2008. 

LUL has decided that many small market stalls that are open in and around tube stations are no longer required. By doing this they are taking away our livelyhood, many of these stalls have been there for over 20 years. LUL consider small market traders as clutter and obstructions, they want to close us down.

We small traders have always worked hard, been of good service to the customers of LUL, provided rent to LUL. 

We are part of London and London is part of us, please support this campaign to stop these moves by London Underground Limited. In this economic era small business are the life blood of any community, we provide a service, we provide jobs, we provide revenue as rents, we help other businesses by buying goods from them, by being there we have helped to stop crime.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
